      • withTransaction

        public static <T> T withTransaction(String dbName,
                    boolean readOnly,
                    F.Function0<T> block)
                         throws Throwable
        Run a block of code in a JPA transaction.
        Parameters:
        dbName - The persistence unit name
        readOnly - Is the transaction read-only?
        block - Block of code to execute.
        Throws:
        Throwable
